tool_description: Estimates the probability of loan default using advanced statistical models and borrower risk characteristics over specified time horizons.

risk_features.description: Risk feature array from feature engineering

error_messages: Invalid credit score: Score must be within valid range (300-850 or equivalent).
Invalid loan amount: Loan amount must be positive.
Insufficient risk features: At least 5 risk features required for probability estimation.
Invalid time horizon: Use one of [12, 24, 36] months.
Unsupported economic scenario: Use one of [baseline, stress, adverse].
usage: Provide credit_score, loan_amount, and risk_features, optionally specify time_horizon and economic_scenario. Returns probability of default with confidence intervals.

probability_band.description: Default probability category: very_low, low, medium, high, very_high

risk_drivers.description: Top risk factors contributing to default probability
